name: Invasion From Beyond (itch)
description:
Invasion from beyond is a quick 2D Side-Scroller Action game about a forest park ranger called Riley and and her Dog Sheriff.

In a late night shift in the middle of the forest both of them hear a loud noise and go check it out to see what it is.

You'll learn more about it while you play the game ;)

Main Objective

I made this game with the objective to improve my coding skills and logic and personally i think it really help me with that.

Even though i would like to continue imrpoving and actually make this game great i'm already into something new and more ambicious so i'm putting my effort into this new project and don't realy fell like continuing Invasion From Beyond, at least for now...

How to play

W, A, S, D to WALK

LMB(Left Mouse Button) to Shoot

E to Interact

Any other commands will be shown in the middle of the game.

Credits 

Main Character - https://poohcom1.itch.io/soldier-girl-sprite-pack

    - I made some modifications in the sprite to suit the game needs.

Main Character but Top-Down - https://itch.io/queue/c/582291/rpg-maker-characters-pack?game_id=313312

Dog - https://rmazanek.itch.io/dog

Forest - https://blackwolfdave.itch.io/forest-pass

Cabin - https://cardinalzebra.itch.io/fantasy-interior-tiles

Aliens - https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-enemy-sprite-sheets-pixel-art

    - I modified the mummy to look like aliens

All the sounds were taken from FreeSound - https://freesound.org/

I wasn't able to find all the links so if you're the artist behind one of those arts and want me to credit you just send me a message with the link and i'll credit you.

GitHub

If you think you can make this game better, fell free to modify it they way you want by following me and getting the game project files on my github.

https://github.com/LucasHLA/Aliens-in-Forest
